Content.Title: This is CBBC!
Content.Synopsis: Join the CBBC crew for all your favourite programmes, plus loads more! Tune into CBBC everyday from 7.00am to 7.00pm.

Content.Title: ChuckleVision
Content.Synopsis: Fellowship of the Purple Pimple - Highway Robbery: Paul and Barry meet up with their old friend the Countess. [S]

Content.Title: ChuckleVision
Content.Synopsis: Fellowship of the Purple Pimple - Smugglers: The Brothers come across an old enemy. [S]

Content.Title: ChuckleVision
Content.Synopsis: The Real Purple Pimple: Paul and Barry try to save Sir Percy and the Countess from the clutches of Robespierre. [S]

Content.Title: ChuckleVision
Content.Synopsis: The Lift: The Brothers are trapped in a lift with No Slacking. [S]

Content.Title: Dick and Dom in Da Bungalow
Content.Synopsis: Dick and Dom provide more laughs, gunge and downright silliness.

Content.Title: The Batman
Content.Synopsis: The Man Who Would Be Bat: Dr Langstrom, a scientist in Wayne Industry's Genome Division, has been experimenting with bats, thus threatening to endanger Bruce's secret identity. [S]

Content.Title: The Batman
Content.Synopsis: The Big Chill: The Batman is on the trail of Mr Freeze, a villain who uses his ice technology as a means of stealing the objects of his passion - the rarest, most valuable diamonds. [S]

Content.Title: The Batman
Content.Synopsis: The Cat and the Bat: After a news report erroneously links her with the Batman, Selina Kyle, the cat burglar known as Catwoman, decides she wants to meet her nighttime counterpart. [S]

Content.Title: Tracy Beaker
Content.Synopsis: Love & War/Beam Me Up Scottie: A new care worker is sending one heart a-flutter, while Hayley's convinced that Duke's up to no good; Hayley proves that the cute ones get fostered first. [S]

Content.Title: Tracy Beaker
Content.Synopsis: Testing Times/Best of Enemies: An official visitor to the DG inspires Tracy to review Cam's progress; Tracy agrees to help Elaine out. [S] Followed by @ the Edge.

Content.Title: Kerching!
Content.Synopsis: Just the Job/Faking It: Rudeboy invents a job for Taj's mum; Taj is excited to find his Dad's designs for inventions. [S] Followed by Friends International.

Content.Title: SMart
Content.Synopsis: Stories: The art show packed with ideas to help you with your picture making. [S]

Content.Title: SMart
Content.Synopsis: Texture: The art show packed with ideas to help you with your picture making. [S]

Content.Title: Blue Peter
Content.Synopsis: Catch up with the magazine programme with celebrity guests, music, sport, food, and a whole lot more. [S]

Content.Title: Watch My Chops
Content.Synopsis: Let Talking Dogs Lie: Corneil has had enough of Bernie's lies, especially when he claims John and Beth said he could have their invite to a celebrity party before they went away. [AD,S]

Content.Title: Best of Friends
Content.Synopsis: Rani and Abs bring you the show that tests the friendships of five close mates with a series of terrible tasks and tantalising treats. Will they choose fun over friendship? [S]

Content.Title: Witch
Content.Synopsis: It Begins: Join Will, Irma, Taranee, Cornelia and Hay-Lin, five normal teenage girls who are suddenly thrown into an adventure that will change their lives forever. [S]

Content.Title: Witch
Content.Synopsis: It Resumes: When Phobos learns that a new generation of Guardians have arrived, he orders that Will, their leader, be seized. [S] Followed by Cramp Twins.

Content.Title: Serious Desert
Content.Synopsis: The Serious Desert team face their first night in the wild during a week of intensive desert training. Freak rainstorms make coping with the extreme conditions even tougher than expected. [S]

Content.Title: Tracy Beaker
Content.Synopsis: The Finishing Line/Dear Dad: Jackie receives some upsetting news; Crash finds he has more in common with Rio than he first thought, while Marco's investigating a theft. [AD,S]

Content.Title: TOTP Reloaded: The Best Bits
Content.Synopsis: Fearne Cotton with all the latest gossip, entertainment, news and top performances. [S] Followed by Arthur.
